reset_password.email_if_found: If we find a user account with the email address you provided we soon will send a confirmation email. Clicking on the link in the email will allow you to continue resetting your password.
reset_password.instructions: You already have a user account, but don't remember your password? Solve this problem in just a few steps. First, type your email address in here.
